modName: Women of the Thieves Guild - Standalone Enhancements
summary: This mod makes standalone appearance changes to Vex, Tonilia, Karliah, and Sapphire of the Thieve's Guild. No other mods are required for this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=5][b][img]http://i.imgur.com/oTWpvpV.png[/img]

~About this mod~[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]This mod makes standalone changes to Vex, Tonilia, Sapphire, and Karliah. It also adds a chest containing the Thieve's Guild armor variants to The Ragged Flagon and Tonilia will also now sell you these armors.

No other mods are needed. (My first standalone mod attempt..)[/size]

Everyone has their own opinion of "beauty". Therefore, I am not claiming this mod as a beautification attempt at these NPCs. I went with appearances that I find to suit the NPC's given personality. I hope you like this mod. Thanks!

[b][color=#ffff00][size=5]~Information~[/size][/color][/b]
[u]
[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Karliah[/size][/color][/u]
[size=4]Eye Color: Zombie
Body: UNP
Hair Style: SG Hair - Blitz

[u][color=#1e84cc]Sapphire[/color][/u]
[size=4]Eye Color: Ocean
Body: UNP
Hair Style: SG Hair - Raon

[u][color=#1e84cc]Tonilia[/color][/u]
Eye Color: Desert
Body: UNP
Hair Style: SG Hair - Ocean Blue
[u]
[color=#1e84cc]Vex[/color][/u]
Eye Color: Moss
Body: UNP
Hair Style: Apachii (extra female hair pack) - 09
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]~Requirements~[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Latest version of Skyrim[/size]
